title: Smallest String Starting From Leaf
content: Given the of a binary tree, each node has a value from 0 to 25 representing the letters to : a value of 0 represents , a value of 1 represents , and so on. Find the lexicographically smallest string that starts at a leaf of this tree and ends at the root. (As a reminder, any shorter prefix of a string is lexicographically smaller: for example, is lexicographically smaller than . A leaf of a node is a node that has no children.)
